name: Tetris Coursera
description:
Tetris

For Coursera, Game Design & Development:

Buttons to Play:

'1' and '3' to rotate.

'2' or Up Arrow to send down slowly.

Space Bar or Down Arrow to drop down.

Side Arrows to move to sides.

Modifications: Programmed Score, Programmed Highscore, Added Game Title

By Daniel R.

A link I used and then added a load more of my own code, adjusted code and added more to the game-screen:
